title: Team Builder queue time is beyond a joke...

embed.description: A quick video showing how stupid Team Builder is. Also like this video so I can afford a pop filter :D

body:
Just yesterday I tried to queue up in Team Builder to practice mid lane TF. We waited for 3 hours and never got in game. We queued from 4:26 pm till 10:26 pm (Sydney time), and never even managed to get a full team in lobby. I'm Silver 3 elo so there is no reason for long queue times. 3 hours queue time is ridiculous, I even recorded it because I'm sure many people wouldn't believe me. 

What the hell is wrong with Team Builder Riot? Can we get it replaced with Draft Pick already?

Not trying to hate on you guys but this is unacceptable honestly.

Yeah dude I 100% agree, it is so fucking stupid that teambuilder is up 24/7 while being a completely useless queue, yet 3v3 which takes less players is only available a few times a week. When they released teambuilder it was cool but its problems started showing, no invites like you said, longer and longer queues, no fill role, lobbies having to be completely restarted and probably other issues I forgot. I really wish they could just replace it with draft so we could avoid some of the problem champions of this meta while having some fun in normals or at LEAST just remove it.
